Traits.Name: Flying
Traits.Description: Ignores all terrain and terrain effects other than impassable terrain, and ignores engagement and obstruction.

Actions.Name: Spirit Away
Actions.Description: The Hob swaps places with a character in range 2, teleporting both. If either character cannot teleport, this move cannot be made.

Actions.Name: Anguish
Actions.Description: The banshee ends its turn. It must take a slow turn next round, but at the start of that turn, it emits a blast 2 area effect centered on it. Characters inside other than banshees must save or take [D] three times, or once on a successful save. On a failed save, characters are also shoved outside the area by the most direct route possible.
